tasks.commit: npm ci && deno fmt && deno task build
tasks.bundle: deno lint && deno test --fail-fast && npx esbuild index.js --bundle --sourcemap --outfile=dist/meergo.bundle.js
tasks.build: deno task bundle && deno task transpile && deno task minify
tasks.build:es6: deno lint && deno test --fail-fast && npx esbuild meergo.js --bundle --sourcemap --define:'globalThis=window' --format=esm --target=es6 --minify --outfile=dist/meergo.es6.min.js
tasks.build:cjs: deno lint && deno test --fail-fast && npx esbuild meergo.js --bundle --sourcemap --define:'globalThis=window' --format=cjs --target=esnext --outfile=dist/meergo.bundle.cjs
tasks.publish: deno task build && npm publish --access public
